name: Spell Club (PhillSerrazina)
description:
Prepare for battle! Ready your wand and greet your opponent before you fight a battle to the death. You can choose between 6 spells to develop your strategy and bring victory and glory upon yourself!

Spell Club is a multiplayer game (sorry, single players, maybe in the future!) where you have 6 spells at your disposal to defeat your opponent.

This is simply a prototype and I am asking *you* to tell me if this is worth developing! And if yes, what would you like to see? I personally would love a single-player version of this where you can choose from all sorts of spells!

Let me know what you think!



Village Environment: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/free-fantasy-medie...

UI: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/gui-pro-kit-casual-game-176695
